content:
PHASE 4 COMPLETE

All four SHARE/OBSERVE tasks completed successfully.

TASK RESULTS:
- 4-1 (share): POST/DELETE /share, GET /participants endpoints
- 4-2 (observe): GET /notebooks/{id}/observe?since= endpoint
- 4-3 (events): SSE streaming at GET /notebooks/{id}/events
- 4-4 (discovery): GET/POST/DELETE /notebooks endpoints

FILES CREATED:
- crates/notebook-server/src/routes/{share.rs, observe.rs, events.rs, notebooks.rs}
- crates/notebook-server/src/events.rs (EventBroadcaster)

ENDPOINTS:
- POST /notebooks/{id}/share - Grant access
- DELETE /notebooks/{id}/share/{author_id} - Revoke access
- GET /notebooks/{id}/participants - List participants
- GET /notebooks/{id}/observe?since= - Get changes since sequence
- GET /notebooks/{id}/events - SSE stream
- GET /notebooks - List accessible notebooks
- POST /notebooks - Create notebook
- DELETE /notebooks/{id} - Delete notebook

KEY CAPABILITIES:
- Multi-agent notebook sharing with permissions
- Change observation with entropy aggregation
- Real-time event streaming (SSE)
- Notebook discovery and management
author: orchestrator
